title: Velvet Thunder
description: A dramatic burst of sound that feels like lightning wrapped in a silk scarf.

title: Banana Orbit
description: A quirky space-themed jam about a fruit lost in zero gravity.

title: Echo of the Pancake
description: A slow, syrupy ballad inspired by breakfast and heartbreak.

title: Laser Lullaby
description: A soft lullaby sung by robots to put satellites to sleep.

title: Cactus Disco
description: A spiky dance hit made entirely from desert-inspired beats.

title: Neon Pickle Parade
description: A chaotic yet cheerful tune that sounds like pickles marching under glow sticks.

title: Cloud Karate
description: A smooth track with gentle kicks and fluffy punches in the sky.

title: Funky Noodle Quest
description: A groovy adventure through a bowl of intergalactic ramen.

title: Waffle Whispers
description: A sweet and crunchy ASMR-style melody sung by waffles in the moonlight.

title: Haunted Toaster
description: A spooky jam where every beat feels like your breakfast is watching you.
